dcterms:creator: Hao Chen
Zhenwei Shi
dcterms:description: LEVIR-CD is a building change detection dataset that contains remote sensing image pairs of resolution 1024 × 1024. The authors crop non-overlapping patches of size 256 × 256 and randomly split them into three parts for training, validation, and testing.
dcterms:title: LEVIR-CD

dcterms:creator: Chenxiao Zhang
Peng Yue
Deodato Tapete
Liangcun Jiang
Boyi Shangguan
Li Huang
Guangchao Liu
dcterms:description: DSIFN-CD is a general change detection dataset that contains changes in different land-cover objects. The authors create non-overlapping patches of size 256 × 256 from the 512 × 512 images while utilizing the authors’ default train/val/test sets.
dcterms:title: DSIFN-CD
